item.title: INCEPTION MINING INC 10-K
item.description: INCEPTION MINING INC, which is in the Gold & Silver Ores [1040] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 15, 2022 had 23785 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 538 instances stock - 256 instances may - 213 instances december - 209 instances 31 - 208 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
